GSD.product_version: versions from v5.3 to before v5.4.198
GSD.description:
netfilter: nf_tables: memleak flow rule from commit path

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.198 by commit 5b8d63489c3b701eb2a76f848ec94d8cbc9373b9, it was introduced in version v5.3 by commit c9626a2cbdb20e26587b3fad99960520a023432b. For more details please see the references link.
